@wp.kernel
def rand_expr_aldent(data: wp.array(dtype=float)):
    tid = wp.tid()
    v0 = data[tid]
    v1 = 0.0
    v2 = 1.0
    tmp = 0.0
    v1 = 0.85
    tmp = wp.exp(tmp)
    v1 = tmp
    v1 = 0.44
    tmp = wp.exp((tmp * v0))
    tmp = (wp.sin(0.12) * v0)
    tmp = 0.50
    data[tid] = v0
